typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: Found a call to a method which will perform a byte to String (or String to byte) conversion, and will assume that the default platform encoding is suitable. (From FindBugs™ description)

event.description: {CovLStr{v1}{{0} is incompatible with expected argument type {1}.}{String}{Integer}}

typePropertiesGroup.type: GC: Suspicious calls to generic collection methods
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: This call to a generic collection method contains an argument with an incompatible class from that of the collection's parameter (i.e., the type of the argument is neither a supertype nor a subtype of the corresponding generic type argument). (From FindBugs™ description)
